org.seedstack.jpa

Class BaseJpaRepository<A extends AggregateRoot<I>,I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.seedstack.business.domain.BaseRepository<A,I>
      • org.seedstack.jpa.BaseJpaRepository<A,I>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - Aggregate root class
    I - Identifier class
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Repository<A,I>

    public abstract class BaseJpaRepository<A extends AggregateRoot<I>,I>
extends BaseRepository<A,I>
    This class can serve as a base class for the JPA repositories. It provides methods for common CRUD operations as well as access to the entity manager through the getEntityManager() protected method.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.seedstack.business.domain.Repository

      This protected constructor is intended to be used by JPA repositories that already know their aggregate root and key classes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BaseJpaRepository

        public BaseJpaRepository()
        Default constructor.

      • BaseJpaRepository

        protected BaseJpaRepository(Class<A> aggregateRootClass,
                            Class<I> idClass)
        This protected constructor is intended to be used by JPA repositories that already know their aggregate root and key classes. It is notably used internally by DefaultJpaRepository for providing a default JPA repository for all aggregates.
        Parameters:
        aggregateRootClass - the aggregate root class.
        idClass - the id class.

      • get

        public Stream<A> get(Specification<A> specification,
                     Repository.Option... options)
        Description copied from interface: Repository
        Finds all aggregates in the repository satisfying the given specification. Options can be specified to alter the returned stream (order, limits, ...).
        Parameters:
        specification - the specification aggregates must satisfy.
        options - result options.
        Returns:
        a stream of aggregates.
        See Also:
        Repository.Option

      • contains

        public boolean contains(A aggregate)
        Description copied from interface: Repository
        Checks that the specified aggregate is present in the repository. The check is only done on the aggregate identity, so this method is equivalent to calling contains(aggregate.getId() ).
        Parameters:
        aggregate - the aggregate identifier.
        Returns:
        true if the aggregate is present, false otherwise.

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Description copied from interface: Repository
